Sentencas: Combustion synthesis is a simple and reproducible method used to obtain fine ceramic powders, which can be used in energy-generation devices such as solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Influence of fuel on morphology of LSM powders obtained by solution combustion synthesis

Sentencas: Strontium-doped lanthanum manganites (LSM) are materials applied commonly as cathodes in a SOFC and can be obtained by combustion synthesis.
Titulo: Influence of fuel on morphology of LSM powders obtained by solution combustion synthesis

Sentencas: Different combustion synthesis routes of ISM were evaluated in this paper, considering the influence of fuel amount and type in the phase formation and morphology of the powders.
Titulo: Influence of fuel on morphology of LSM powders obtained by solution combustion synthesis

Sentencas: Moreover, a new fuel mixture, urea and sucrose, was proposed for the preparation of LSM powders.
Titulo: Influence of fuel on morphology of LSM powders obtained by solution combustion synthesis

Sentencas: The synthesized powders showed significant loss of mass when obtained with 200% excess of oxidizers, and the use of urea resulted in single-phase powders directly from the combustion reaction.
Titulo: Influence of fuel on morphology of LSM powders obtained by solution combustion synthesis

Sentencas: After calcination, a single-phase rhombohedral perovskite phase was identified in all powders.
Titulo: Influence of fuel on morphology of LSM powders obtained by solution combustion synthesis

Sentencas: A larger specific surface area of calcined powders (34.9 m(2)/g) and a smaller crystallite (sized 18 nm) were obtained using sucrose as fuel, followed by the synthesis with mixed fuels (13.2 m(2)/g and 26 nm).
Titulo: Influence of fuel on morphology of LSM powders obtained by solution combustion synthesis

Sentencas: These results were correlated with the morphology of the aggregates, which was visibly influenced by the nature of the precursor solution.
Titulo: Influence of fuel on morphology of LSM powders obtained by solution combustion synthesis

Sentencas: The mixed fuels combustion led to a powder where the particles aggregated in a form of submicrometric hollow structures.
Titulo: Influence of fuel on morphology of LSM powders obtained by solution combustion synthesis
